connector.description: Send data to an FTPS server.

camel.kamelet.ftps-sink.connectionHost.name: camel.kamelet.ftps-sink.connectionHost
camel.kamelet.ftps-sink.connectionHost.description: The hostname of the FTP server.

camel.kamelet.ftps-sink.connectionPort.name: camel.kamelet.ftps-sink.connectionPort
camel.kamelet.ftps-sink.connectionPort.description: The port of the FTP server.

camel.kamelet.ftps-sink.username.name: camel.kamelet.ftps-sink.username
camel.kamelet.ftps-sink.username.description: The username to access the FTP server.

camel.kamelet.ftps-sink.password.name: camel.kamelet.ftps-sink.password
camel.kamelet.ftps-sink.password.description: The password to access the FTP server.

camel.kamelet.ftps-sink.fileExist.name: camel.kamelet.ftps-sink.fileExist
camel.kamelet.ftps-sink.fileExist.description: Specifies how the Kamelet behaves if the file already exists.

camel.kamelet.ftps-sink.binary.name: camel.kamelet.ftps-sink.binary
camel.kamelet.ftps-sink.binary.description: Specifies the file transfer mode, BINARY or ASCII. Default is ASCII (false).

camel.kamelet.ftps-sink.autoCreate.name: camel.kamelet.ftps-sink.autoCreate
camel.kamelet.ftps-sink.autoCreate.description: Automatically create the directory the files should be written to.
